name: Nintriva Wireless
overview: Since its founding in Kerala in 2010, Nintriva Wireless, has become one of the quality supplier of mobile software products, web applications in India and abroad, with head office set in Thrissur, Kerala and home offices in different locations. Nintriva Wireless has been started as a team of freelance software developers who worked in mobile software services and different web technologies. They started working and collaborating online from their own locations. The company concentrates on Android as a mobile platform and Yii as a web technology, and Google’s app-engine and Pagodabox as primary deployment platforms. The founders have good knowledge in Mobile Software, Cloud technologies and Embedded Systems. The company later became a limited liability partnership in 2012.
